snippet: The Federal Trade Commission is looking at the details of one of Visa’s debit card programs to see if it complies with new rules under the 2010 financial regulatory reform.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission is looking at details of one of Visa's debit card programs to see if it complies with new rules under the 2010 financial regulatory reform.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission is looking at the details of one of Visa’s debit card programs to see if it complies with new rules under the 2010 financial regulatory reform.

headline.main: F.T.C. Inquiry Into a Visa Debit Card Program
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Inquiry Into a Visa Debit Card Program
